Application.Name: Java JDK
Application.Description: Includes both 64bit and 32bit Java Platform, Standard Edition Development Kit (JDK). The JDK is a development environment for building applications, applets, and components using the Java programming language. The JDK includes tools useful for developing and testing programs written in the Java programming language and running on the Java platform.

Download.PrefetchScript:
$request = Invoke-WebRequest http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html $dnlds = ($request.Scripts | where innerHTML -like "*var downloads = new Array();*").InnerHTML
$DLs = @() $dnlds.split("`n") | foreach { if ($_ -like "*windows x64*"){ $DLs += $_ } } $DL= $DLs[0] $start = $DL.IndexOf('http://') $end = $DL.LastIndexOf('.exe') $URI = $DL.Substring($start,$end-$start+4) $URI
$Webclient = New-Object System.Net.WebClient $Webclient.Headers.add('cookie','oraclelicense=accept-securebackup-cookie') $Webclient.DownloadFile($uri,$DownloadFile) Remove-Item "$env:USERPROFILE\AppData\LocalLow\Oracle\Java\" -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Download.DownloadVersionCheck: Remove-Item "$env:USERPROFILE\AppData\LocalLow\Oracle\Java\" -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue Remove-Item "C:\Temp\JavaJDKx64\" -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue $FullVersion = (Get-Item $TempDir\$DownloadFileName).VersionInfo.FileVersion $Version = "$($FullVersion[0])u$($FullVersion.Split(".")[2].substring(0,3))" $JavaFileName = "jdk1.$($Fullversion.Substring(0,3))_$($FullVersion.Split(".")[2].substring(0,3))64.msi" $JavaProc = Start-Process $TempDir\$DownloadFileName -PassThru Sleep 15 get-process "msiexec*" | where MainWindowTitle -Like "*java SE Devel*" |Stop-Process New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path "C:\Temp\JavaJDKx64" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue copy-item "$env:USERPROFILE\AppData\LocalLow\Oracle\Java\jdk1*64\*.*" -Destination C:\Temp\JavaJDKx64\ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue Rename-Item "C:\Temp\JavaJDKx64\$JavaFileName" -NewName JavaJDKx64.msi -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Download.ExtraCopyFunctions: Copy-Item C:\Temp\JavaJDKx64\*.* -Destination $DestinationPath\ -Force Remove-Item "$env:USERPROFILE\AppData\LocalLow\Oracle\Java\" -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue Remove-Item "C:\Temp\JavaJDKx64\" -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
